steps.title: Verify Java Installation

evidence_actions.intent: Obtain proof of Java installation/version

validations.description: Java is installed
Java is not installed

evidence_actions.intent: Obtain screenshot of updated Java version

request.prompt: Please provide a screenshot showing the current Java version after update.

validations.description: Java is updated to latest version
Java not updated

how_to_reach: IE: Tools > Internet Options > Advanced > Security

evidence_actions.intent: Check if user disabled and re-enabled Java in browser

request.prompt: Did you disable and then re-enable Java in your browser settings, and restart the browser?

evidence_actions.intent: Check if issue is resolved after re-enabling Java

request.prompt: Is your Java issue resolved after re-enabling?

validations.description: Java is enabled after re-enabling
User confirms issue resolved

steps.title: Check Java Settings

evidence_actions.intent: Check if Java security settings are blocking application

evidence_actions.intent: Check if issue is resolved after checking settings

request.prompt: Is your Java issue resolved after checking settings?

validations.description: Java is enabled in Control Panel
Security settings are not blocking
User confirms issue resolved

steps.title: Clear Java Cache
steps.instruction: Clear the Java cache via the Java Control Panel: General > Settings > Delete Files. Restart your browser and try again.
how_to_reach: Windows: Start > Control Panel > Java > General > Settings > Delete Files
Mac: Applications > Utilities > Java > General > Settings > Delete Files

evidence_actions.intent: Check if user cleared Java cache as instructed

request.prompt: Did you clear the Java cache via the Java Control Panel and restart your browser?

evidence_actions.intent: Check if issue is resolved after clearing cache

request.prompt: Is your Java issue resolved now?

validations.description: Cache cleared and issue resolved
Cache cleared but issue not resolved

on_pass.rationale: Proceed if cache cleared but not resolved

steps.title: Run Java in 32-bit Mode

how_to_reach: Mac: Right-click app > Get Info > Open in 32-bit mode

how_to_reach: Windows: Event Viewer > Windows Logs > Application

request.parse_hint: Look for lines mentioning Java errors in Event Viewer (Windows) or Console (Mac).

validations.description: Java-related error message found in system logs
No Java error found in system logs

on_pass.rationale: Error found, escalate with details

on_fail.rationale: No error found, escalate for further help

validations.description: User confirms escalation and info ready

escalate_requirements: Provide error messages, logs, and steps taken.

title: Reset a Computer's BIOS to Default Settings

steps.title: Access the BIOS

request.prompt: What is the BIOS version shown after reboot?

evidence_actions.intent: Check current BIOS version

validations.description: User confirms BIOS reset was successful

on_fail.rationale: If reset failed, suggest troubleshooting

validations.description: User reports an error message

steps.expected_observation: User is aware of escalation path.

steps.title: Install Scanner Driver
steps.instruction: Download and install the latest scanner driver from the manufacturer's website. Restart your workstation after installation.

Driver not installed

Scanner must be shared on the network

title: Troubleshoot Common Microsoft Word Issues
summary: Step-by-step guide to resolve common Microsoft Word problems, including restarts, updates, disabling add-ins, checking files, and reinstalling if needed.

fact_specs.description: Application being troubleshot
fact_specs.extraction_hint: Should be Microsoft Word

fact_specs.description: User confirms if issue is resolved
fact_specs.extraction_hint: Ask user after each step

fact_specs.description: Error message shown in Word, if any
fact_specs.extraction_hint: Ask user or request screenshot

fact_specs.description: Operating system in use
fact_specs.extraction_hint: Ask user or infer from context

fact_specs.description: Version of Microsoft Word
fact_specs.extraction_hint: Ask user or get from screenshot

steps.title: Restart Word and Computer
steps.instruction: Close Microsoft Word and restart your computer. Then reopen Word and check if the issue is resolved.
how_to_reach: Close Word from the taskbar or File > Exit

evidence_actions.intent: Confirm user has restarted Word and computer

request.prompt: Have you closed Word and restarted your computer?

evidence_actions.intent: Check if issue is resolved after restart

request.prompt: Is your issue resolved after restarting?

validations.description: User confirms restart completed
User says issue resolved after restart
User says issue not resolved after restart

on_fail.rationale: Proceed to check for updates if restart did not resolve issue

steps.expected_observation: Word starts normally or issue persists.

steps.title: Check for Updates
steps.instruction: Open Word, go to File > Account > Update Options > Update Now. Install updates if available, then restart Word.
how_to_reach: File > Account > Update Options > Update Now

evidence_actions.intent: Confirm user checked for and installed updates

request.prompt: Did you check for and install updates in Word?

evidence_actions.intent: Check if issue is resolved after updates

request.prompt: Is your issue resolved after updating Word?

validations.description: User confirms updates checked/installed
User says issue resolved after update
User says issue not resolved after update

steps.expected_observation: Word is updated to latest version.

steps.title: Disable Add-ins
steps.instruction: Go to File > Options > Add-ins. Uncheck all add-ins, click OK, restart Word, and test if the issue persists.

evidence_actions.intent: Check if user disabled add-ins and restarted Word

request.prompt: Did you disable all add-ins and restart Word?

evidence_actions.intent: Check if issue persists after disabling add-ins

request.prompt: Does the issue still happen after disabling add-ins?

validations.description: Issue resolved after disabling add-ins
Issue not resolved after disabling add-ins

on_pass.rationale: Proceed to check for corrupt files

steps.expected_observation: Word works without add-ins or issue persists.

steps.title: Check for Corrupt Files
steps.instruction: Open a new document. If issue persists, try a different file or save the problem file in a new format.
how_to_reach: Try opening files from different locations

evidence_actions.intent: Check if issue persists in a new document

request.prompt: Does the issue happen in a new Word document?

evidence_actions.intent: Check if issue persists with other files or after saving in new format

request.prompt: Did you try another file or save the problem file in a new format? Did the issue persist?

validations.description: Issue resolved after checking for corrupt files or saving in new format
Issue not resolved after checking for corrupt files

steps.expected_observation: Issue is isolated to specific files or persists with all files.

steps.title: Check for Conflicting Software
steps.instruction: Close unnecessary applications. If recently installed software, try uninstalling or disabling its integration with Word.
how_to_reach: Close background apps via Task Manager

evidence_actions.intent: Check if user closed unnecessary apps and tried disabling/uninstalling recent software integrations with Word.

request.prompt: Did you close unnecessary apps and try disabling or uninstalling any recently installed software that integrates with Word?

validations.description: User confirms they closed unnecessary apps and tried disabling/uninstalling recent software.
User says issue resolved after closing apps or uninstalling software.

on_pass.rationale: Issue resolved after closing conflicting software.

on_fail.rationale: Proceed to Safe Mode troubleshooting.

steps.expected_observation: Word works after closing or uninstalling conflicting software.

steps.title: Run Word in Safe Mode
steps.instruction: Press Windows + R, type 'winword.exe /safe', and press Enter. Test if Word works in Safe Mode.

evidence_actions.intent: Ask if user was able to start Word in Safe Mode and if issue persists.

request.prompt: Were you able to start Word in Safe Mode, and does the issue still occur?

validations.description: User confirms Word works in Safe Mode.
User says issue resolved in Safe Mode.
User says issue persists in Safe Mode.

on_pass.rationale: Issue resolved in Safe Mode.

steps.expected_observation: Word works in Safe Mode or issue persists.

steps.title: Reinstall Microsoft Word
steps.instruction: If none of the above steps work, uninstall and reinstall Microsoft Word. Ensure you have installation media or access.

evidence_actions.intent: Check if user has uninstalled and reinstalled Word

request.prompt: Have you uninstalled and reinstalled Microsoft Word?

evidence_actions.intent: Check if issue is resolved after reinstall

request.prompt: Is your issue resolved after reinstalling Word?

validations.description: User confirms issue resolved after reinstall
User says issue not resolved after reinstall

steps.safety_notes: Ensure you have license/installation access before uninstalling.
steps.expected_observation: Word is reinstalled and issue is resolved or persists.

verify_prompts: Is the issue with Microsoft Word resolved after this step?
Did you see any error messages? If so, what did they say?
escalate_requirements: Issue persists after reinstalling Word
User cannot reinstall due to permissions

slot_questions.question: What operating system are you using (Windows or macOS)?
What version of Microsoft Word are you using?

artifact_requests.prompt: Please copy and paste any error message you see in Word.
Can you provide a screenshot of the issue in Word?

ask_if_uncertain: What specific issue are you experiencing with Word?
Are you seeing any error messages?
Has this issue happened before?
